website_summaries.verdict: Three walkie-talkies that are easy for kids to use and come from a company that stands by its products.
pros: Offers two-mile range and 22 channels in casing design that is easy for little hands to grip
A good choice for a group of kids, as you get three walkie-talkies in this set
We also love the bright, fun colors
Customer service is prompt if issues occur
cons: Occasional defective units have been reported
Some walkie-talkies arrived with missing pieces, but the company sent replacements

customer_reviews.title: Honest company wants to resolve issues!
customer_reviews.text: They day these arrived, my grandkids were using them...the blue and pink, and was grinning ear to ear, until the the 2 year old said hers was hot. I checked it, and sure enough it was super hot, and hadn't been working. I tool the pink one, gave her the yellow one, which worked and didnt get hot. So the pink one never worked except for the initial use, 15-20 minutes. *****Update***** This company emailed me and told me they had refunded my money, AND are sending me replacements. They have been prompt in answering my questions and very pleasant and kind.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: With three kids this was a perfect purchase...they work well, have a long range throughout the house and outside and the extras (i.e., the flashlight and belt clip) were big hits too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gladstone

customer_reviews.title: Very good size and easy for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered for six year old twin girls birthday present. The third one was for the parents to contact the girls or their 2 year old brother if left out in the open. The units have been in constant use for days as the girls use them to update each other when bike riding, hide and seek, exploring dark rooms in their house (flash light is very useful) and many new things daily.
customer_reviews.author: Everett J.

customer_reviews.title: A fun gift for my son!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these after my son's other walkie talkies bit the dust. We've just started using them, but so far, so good. They are small and cute, bright colored (which he loves), and have good sound quality. The light on the top is pretty convenient for an adventurous little guy! I also love that this comes in a pack of three, as opposed to the normal two, so I can play along with my oldest two kids. :) *I will update this review if anything changes, positive or negative.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. The only thing that kind of stinks is that they take 4 AAA batteries. I spent more on batteries than I did the whole product. LOL Hopefully the batteries last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for my granddaughter so at this point I’m not sure how easy they will be for a 4yr old to use. Also not sure how durable they will be. But the colors are nice and bright. I put batteries in them and they worked fine. I will say that there are a lot of extra buttons that she doesn’t need to fool with. But that lets the walki talki be less a toy and more something that can be used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy zarina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are so cheap. The first day we tried to use them they wouldn’t work with batteries (of the same brand) from two different packs. We had to go to the store and buy enough batteries to use them from the same pack. The pink one stopped working on the first day. The battery pack covers slide off super easily. The blue one only works if you press on the battery cover to make the batteries connect. These are terrible. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Mojica

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries!
customer_reviews.text: These walkie talkies seemed great because they came in a set of 3 and in perfect colors. However, they were a Christmas gift. I installed batteries in the set and then wrapped them and put them under the tree. One week later, the walkie talkies were opened and the batteries were dead or were so low, there was just enough power to tell us batteries were low. We haven't tried them camping or outside the house but I doubt that they would ever be useful for more than 15 minutes without lots of extra batteries carried along for the trip. What's the point in that!
customer_reviews.author: silent camper

customer_reviews.title: Batteries corroded shortly after purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old bought these with his own money to use with his siblings. We put brand new duracell batteries in them and a couple of weeks later when we went to change the batteries thinking they were dead they were instead covered with corrosion making the walkie talkies worthless! I am almost positive the batteries weren't bad as I have had no trouble with them in other items.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ann Long

customer_reviews.title: My kids absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit with my 5 yr old, 3 yr old, and 2 yr old. The colors were perfect too! They spent hours radioing to each other, and used the flashlight function in the dark. It is great for pretend play as firefighters, and police. They also love the walkie talkies, as they feel so important wearing them and calling each other. The only thing I would change about the design, is adding a small screw to secure the battery cover. Batteries are very dangerous for small children, and when the walkie talkie falls, the cover can come off and the batteries can come out. A screw would secure them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: CRAP
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for her birthday and she opened them up today, so excited to use them. We put brand new fresh batteries in each one and not ONE of them works. You hold down the power button, it shows full and then within 3 seconds shows only 1 bar of power and turns off. VERY DISAPPOINTED and upset that my daughter doesn't even get to use her present on her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the box, I was concerned. I thought that maybe I made a mistake? I unpacked them, put batteries in all three of them and was blown away by how clear and how far away you can be using these. So happy with this purchase! You have multiple channels to choose from, a LCD flashlight that is super bright and fun to see at night and in the dark. Very solid and made well. Kids love them and so do the parents! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bass

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: These walkie talkies surpassed my expectations. They have a great range and are highly durable for children. I bought a second set already. And you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Celia White

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money, But Invest in a Large Amount of Batteries
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids, but the call button gets very irritating due to the loudness and our kids wanting to repeatedly press it. There is also no auto turnoff, so if your kids are like ours and never turn anything off when they are done playing with them, the batteries will die very often and end up costing you more money replacing the batteries. You’d be better off in the long run spending a few extra bucks on some rechargeable walkie talkies.
customer_reviews.author: Good vibes only

customer_reviews.title: Kids no longer allowed to use
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for our two kids and they are no longer allowed to use them. The walkie-talkies malfunction all night long and constantly beep. We aren't sure if they are trying to connect to different radio frequencies or what the issue is but all three do it even if we turn them off. Either they are malfunctioning and therefore cheaply made or they aren't safe for kids (which may be our fault as we purchased for that purpose).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lindblad

customer_reviews.title: Wish these came with a charger!
customer_reviews.text: Cute but cost a fortune in batteries! These drain batteries so quickly! I was putting new batteries in every other day! I'll try taking the batteries out when not being used although that will be a royal pain to do all of the time! Perhaps keeping them in 24 hours a day drains the batteries? It would be great if they had chargers! I've had to give the kids a break with these otherwise I'll go broke buying batteries every week! On a positive note they are fun and kids want to use them everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Find something else, not good
customer_reviews.text: The walkie-talkie trip was a BIG disappointment. We bought them for my twin boys for their birthday and needed an extra for my older son. We returned the first order because one out of 3 didn't work. Then the replacement order was equally as disappointing and didn't work either. They're going back and I won't be buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few days
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my 3 kids for Christmas. They have played with them 3 days and now the pink one doesn’t work. It turns on but doesn’t do anything else. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Harson

customer_reviews.title: Kept hearing other conversations
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple walkie talkie set that still had good sound quality. This set was not that simple as there were several buttons and channels (I wanted my children to be able to use them easily). Also, immediately after turning on the walkie talkies, I could hear other men's voices on the set. Even after changing channels, I could still here someone else talking. That was enough to make me decide to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Mo

customer_reviews.title: fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old kids to play with. They enjoy playing with them, even my 2 year old got in on the action. These are great quality and even have a little flashlight! I know my family will have lots of fun times using these walkie talkies. It's nice it comes with three of them, because I have three kids! Definitely recommend these. Great price, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: KBra84

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and families
customer_reviews.text: The walkie talkie work great! They were a birthday present for our son and he loves being able to use them all around the house. I've found them to be helpful so that we can use the walkie talkies to talk rather than shouting between floors of the house! They even work well when one of us is inside and the other outside. Fun and practical for our family, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Kid Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use with my grandsons (6 and 4), and they are great! Easy for them to use. I like that you can set it for VOX so they don't have to worry about holding the button the whole time they talk. The sounds can be turned down or turned off if you prefer not to have a loud tone each time the buttons are pushed. We're having lots of fun with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: didnt go as far as expected (updated for wonderful customer service)
customer_reviews.text: signal didnt go 1/8th as far as it should have and my daughter frequently accidentally pushes the channel button and its hard to land on the right channel again. (i quickly recieved an email to help me with my problems. apparently there is a lock feature to prevent the channel scan) still not happy with the signal but good customer service is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Katie Haught

customer_reviews.title: Fine, use a lot of battery life
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and cute. They unfortunately come with all sounds/ key tones activated-- you'll want to turn those off immediately. The real downside to these, though, is they go through batteries really fast. I use rechargeable batteries and I need to charge them every two days, and we barely use the walkie talkies at all (my son uses them till call me in the night if he needs me, and a little bit for playing). Overall they're fine, but definitely get some rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: 3 is always better than 2!
customer_reviews.text: These little guys have a long range! We have used them in car rides with multiple cars allowing the kids to talk to one another the whole time (great distraction)! We have dropped them several times and have not broken them. They have a sturdy clip that allows you to wear them on basically anything: A seatbelt, a jacket lapel, belt etc. We recommend these radios for little kid hands !
customer_reviews.author: Allie S

customer_reviews.title: Broke after opening
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening, the yellow one broke when my husband tried to put the batteries in. The metal was too stiff and broke when he tried to place the battery in a broke off. Sent it back for a refund. We will get a different brand for the kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G

customer_reviews.title: Hit of Birthday Party...score!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Birthday gift for 3 year old grandson. His sisters will use other 2. Once this gift was opened, there was NO interest in other gifts! I installed batteries beforehand so they were ready to go. Enclosed extra batteries as reviews say they wear down quickly. Of note: pocket clip is a bit flimsy but not a problem. Will definitely purchase again for future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3 granddaughters ages 4, 8, and 10. They love them! For a toy I can't believe how well they work. So far we are very pleased with the quality of these walkie talkies.
customer_reviews.author: PLee

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away. These are garbage quality.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this is the Amazon choice. These walkie talkies are super crappy. The batteries don't fit properly. Two of three units kept turning on and off due to poor battery connections, and after day 1 the metal contacts broke altogether. One of the three walkie talkies worked however the batteries ran out within an hour. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.E

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for about a week and they've worked great so far for the most part. Only issue was that a couple of days in, one of the walkie talkies wouldn't turn on. The battery contact was somehow bent and once bent back into place it's been working fine since.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to play spy and army with his cousins, so we decided to surprise him with this set and he is thrilled. Endless hours of silly fun with his cousins and friends that keeps them off screens and outside. I love the 3 pack- great price and more fun!
customer_reviews.author: stargirl

customer_reviews.title: Good times, Good Buddy!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for a 4 year old and an 8 year old and the yellow one for their mother!
customer_reviews.author: emanymton

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7yo's birthday, and the three-pack was perfect for him to share with his siblings-- 4.5 and 2.5. As soon as we added batteries, they figured out how to use the walkie talkies and had a blast running around the house talking to each other. The only problem is that my 2.5yo likes to play with the battery door, which does not lock.
customer_reviews.author: K-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren love these!
customer_reviews.text: The walkie-talkies are very colorful and eyecatching. My grandchildren love talking to each other and me when they are outside.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for young kids. Great reception and they don’t fight over them as they each have their own. The only thing is they go through the batteries. So I would recommend rechargeables
customer_reviews.author: Jana D.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun walkies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a beach trip for 3 kids. I would never have imagined how much fun a 6 and two 10 year olds would have. Even after the trip they are constantly playing with them. They have withstood lots of playing and dropping!! The sounds is good and the kids figured them out without us having to give them instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kerridan McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great,, as walkie talkies go. Almost like professional and can go a really long way. I was talking to my grandbabies 3 blocks down the street (no further though). I have twin granddaughters age 7, so they each get one and one for me when they are outside alone. Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily falls apart- Not reflective of the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not drop proof. The clip and battery backing kept getting loose the first day we used them. Bought them in March for us to use as a family and for the children to have fun playing in the backyard and they’ve only been used twice. Even though the sound is somewhat adjustable, the beep sound and audio is still extremely loud. I could deal with that, but not the risk of it falling apart when we were hoping to use them for safety reasons camping. It’s only been two months and I’m back on Amazon looking at reviews for a more durable set. I’m extremely unsure how they were ranked so high. Definitely misled.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Broken/Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: One doesn’t work at all because it is missing part of the battery compartment. See photo - no metal receivers at both bottom center spots. One works inconsistently. One works well. A shame because our three kids were thrilled when they opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: bnd

customer_reviews.title: These Are Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My children have had so much fun with three walkie talkies we've bought 2sets. We've used them at Seaworld and the children loved constant contact without wiring about losing their phones or getting them wet.
customer_reviews.author: Darla King

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.. I love the three colors in this model... it works for both boys and girls...my daughters loved it so much and they even started playing with it even with out batteries ..this is their first time having a walkie talkie and I’m glad that I bought it 😇
customer_reviews.author: Mike brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my three kids, the only reason I didn’t give 5 stars was it seems like I’m always replacing the batteries...but my kids are 2,4, and 9. It’s probably more their issue and the product. The flashlight on the item makes it all the more fun. Mine love to turn the lights out and play flashlight tag!
customer_reviews.author: Tracci & Justin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great at first. The first day we noticed one of them died quickly but the other two were doing fine. They were not used a lot and after having them for a month only one walkie talkie does not burn through batteries in 20 minutes. The kids loved them but with the amount you will spend on batteries it would be best to buy something different.
customer_reviews.author: Beckie E. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad of walkies
customer_reviews.text: These Walkie talkies aren’t that bad. The batteries don’t seem to last a long time. They do span a long distance which is cool for the kids. One of our walkies has a battery compartment that isn’t tight enough for the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This has great range and has different stations to work with. The battery life is amazing. Its really easy to use for the kids and the sound quality is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Akash

customer_reviews.title: Drains batteries like you wouldn’t believe
customer_reviews.text: Each wallow talkie takes four batteries. That’s 12 total to get these working. Within one day each wallow talkie was dying. I refuse to put more batteries in a toy that will ABSOLUTELY drain them with barely any use.
customer_reviews.author: glouise

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Battery life isn't the best. I don't like how easy it is for my kids to lose the proper channel but that's not completely the device's fault.
customer_reviews.author: F S

customer_reviews.title: don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to use, had to be with the kids to help them use it. batteries ran out quickly and did not bother replacing them. Kids use them as fake phones now! Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product the range is very nice. But for the price it’s perfect. Don’t expect the best sound quality but again for the price it is really good. My only issue is the talk button being in the front with the other buttons. Wish it could’ve been on the side.
customer_reviews.author: VIPER22HUSKY

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to our three grandchildren, and they love them! They've only had them for a day, so we'll see. One has been dropped a few times, and seems to be holding up. They've only used them in the house, so I'm not sure of the range, but the sound is nice and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Broke Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas gift and was a bit disappointed when one of the Walkie Talkies did not work. Therefore I cannot give it the best review... only one star.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Independence achieved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted the ability to go out and explore our property, but we weren't super comfortable with letting her wander alone. This gave us a piece of mind that we can check in on her while giving her some freedom and confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Cute and work great so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been good!! My only complaint is they suck battery life and take 12 batteries to use. The brand new top brand batteries were dead in 3 days. But my daughter loves to play with them and loves that it came with 3 brightly colored walkie talkies.
customer_reviews.author: shawna e.

customer_reviews.title: Kids seemed to like it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift to share between nephews/niece of varying ages. I put the batteries in and they were off, spreading around to use it and see how it worked. Now, they just got it recently and I don't seem them all the time to know how often they use them, but initially, the gift seemed to be a success.
customer_reviews.author: C.Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use,  good sound, kids and adults LOVED this gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this pack of 3 walkie talkies for an 8 year old girl slumber party. FREAKING AWESOME!!! Hours of entertainment, easy to use, good sound quality. I just wish I had ordered another set so all the girls could have their own. Decent range on this set as well... works at the neighbor's house across the street!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Broken in the first 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: One of the Walkie Talkies was dropped 5 minutes after putting the batteries in. One of the metal pieces in the battery compartment somehow broke off and now the Walkie Talkie is completely useless and cannot be fixed. The other two seem to be working just fine. I would think that a toy meant for kids would be made to withstand being dropped more than one time. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mama T

customer_reviews.title: Anyone can listen to kids playing
customer_reviews.text: These are not your ordinary kid walkie talkies - they have several channels and we can hear what others are chatting about. I don’t like the idea of others being able to be on the same channel while my kids play. I didn’t realize this was the case when purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Ferrise

customer_reviews.title: Device stopped working after 2 days!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as birthday gifts for my daughters!! Disappointed!! Used it for 2 days., with new batteries!! And 3rd day All three devices stopped working!! Shows low battery !! Too late to return the devices.,wish I had other options!!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Warrantied real walkie-talkies. Fun in a box!
customer_reviews.text: Warrantied toy. Yay! The company has already reached out to remind of the warranty - not just the feedback on the product. The walkie-talkies are a knock-outta-the-park of course! They are small, perfect fit for the 4 and 7 year old hands they were bought for. But not too small that adult hands won't fit. They love playing with their mom and she LOVES hers own pink one. We love the features like flashlight, volume control and channel-scan. There was a pink, yellow and blue one in a small box and OH WHAT JOY that little box is bringing us all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good but..
customer_reviews.text: The battery part is defective. One of the metal pieces that holds the battery in was completely broke off and the other walkie talkie the battery is so loose it won’t connect at all. The last one keeps shutting off and I’m assuming it’s also a battery issue. My daughter was counting down the days tilll we got these and now we can’t wven use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lil more peace of mind for my sis.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My lil nephew loves it cause now he can go a tad bit further when he plays outside. And my sis loves it cause she can check on him without havin to bundle the baby up and go down a bunch of stairs just to check on him now.
customer_reviews.author: girlie chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids play
customer_reviews.text: My three children love using these in our house and backyard. They’ve withstood a few crashes and still sound clear. We bought rechargeable batteries as they each take 4 AAA.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerMom1

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star product. Kid Tested. Parent Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bright colors. I liked that they are small. Everything else was terrible. Very breakable. Hard to understand the buttons. And the range is less than 100 yards. They did not perform the way they were advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: These were good in theory! A little cheap looking upon receiving. They’re a gift so haven’t tested them out yet! They’re for kids so we didn’t need anything super nice, anyway. Also, they’re really small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Range isn't great but they're fun for the house or something.
customer_reviews.text: They're very easy to use and my kids love playing with them. I got them so that they could talk to me at home from their tree house. The range was supposed to be 2 miles or so. These don't reach a quarter mile in the country without city obstructions. Not great range but the kids sure do enjoy them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tara James

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great find for my kids to use when they would go out to play. The range distance on the units was really good and the sound quality was mostly clear, yet they didn't last long. Even with being careful not to drop it and putting it away properly after using it - it only lasted a couple months and then broke. So I guess you could say it was good while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Leslie-Pa

customer_reviews.title: Colors different
customer_reviews.text: Came with 2 blue and 1 pink, wanted three different colors for my brother and his kids. But didn’t know until Christmas and no time to return. I don’t remember seeing trying about possible color switches.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 6 year old. These are great for little ones. Small enough for their hands and easy to use. The negative side is that the material is cheap. The day we opened them one of them broke inside the battery area. It is difficult to insert the batteries (too tight). When we put one of the batteries in a small metal piece that holds the battery just broke off. If you need something durable, this isn’t it,
customer_reviews.author: Sonia S.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the walkie talkies because I have a 6 year old nephew that just started living with me and he always come home from school with colds or some kind of virus from the other kids. I have a 18 month son that loves my nephew but always get sick being around him so I felt the need to buy the walkie talkies so my son can still hear my nephew voice from upstairs and not pass germs around. I love the walkie talkies, I am pretty I might be the only one to buy them for this reason lol but they work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I love this came with 3 so all my kids could have one. The instructions are easy to follow. The sound is great works well. There are tons a channels to choose. And it has nice extras like a light on the top.
customer_reviews.author: K. Flygare

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought some cheap walkie talkies for my grandkids for Christmas. the kids played with them and they were terrible, so I did my research on the Tintec 3-pack Walkie Talkies and Boom! They love them very much. They Item are awesome and do everything described in the ad. Awesome products!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We were really sad only 1 of these would work. They all had fresh batteries in them but 2 would not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: their great
customer_reviews.text: I love the three pack. my two boys get one each and I get one so when their out side playing I can communicate with them when I have to run inside. They work great, are loud even on the low volume. my kids love them. great walkie talkies
customer_reviews.author: L. Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these walkie talkies to my three grand kids, ages 9, 7 and 5, for Christmas. I have to say, of all the gifts they received, they had the most fun with these! They loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Basking in Maine

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR FESTIVALS
customer_reviews.text: cell phone service hardly every works at festivals so these are perfect if you want to wander from the group or if someone gets lost, found my friends and made some new ones with these
customer_reviews.author: C Merritt P

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our 3 girls for Christmas. They love them! They work well and have decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids had been wanting some walkie talkies and when I saw these I thought they would be perfect as there are two of them and one of me, so we could each have one. Plus they are reasonably priced. I am SO happy I chose these ones! They are great!!! Kids and I both love them and the flashlight is such a great bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is just ok as is the range. Hard for a kid to use, so the gift was not the greatest idea.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My kids have only had these for a few days and are playing with them non-stop! My kids ages range from 4-12 and are easy enough for my youngest to use. We had bought a different set prior to finding these and they were too complicated for my kids to figure out. Again, we have only had these a few days, so I can’t really attest to the quality and quite yet. But I’m hopeful!
customer_reviews.author: cherie castillo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These were great but not durable. One drop and the antenna will break off. It happened to all three.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our grandchildren . They like to play with Walkie talkies and we needed a few more. These synced great with our others and seem to be good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scribbs

customer_reviews.title: Fun until you have to change the batteries over and over
customer_reviews.text: These work as expected...good range, and fun to use...they go through batteries very quickly , so I’d recommend getting rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Joniec

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality. Unusable after only less than 2 days of use.
customer_reviews.text: My son has been begging for walkie talkies. We got him these for part of his birthday gift. Day TWO of using and 2 of the 3 walkie talkies don’t work... don’t waste your money.. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Boymama2

customer_reviews.title: One is defective
customer_reviews.text: We just received these and they seemed great until I went to put batteries in the yellow one and saw that the metal contacts are missing for the batteries, so we can’t use it. Guess we will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Delaine R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Two battery terminal pieces broke from putting in batteries. Re-soldered and it works but poor quality. But they were inexpensive and work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. Only tried within a short distance but that's all I needed them for. My kids enjoy them as well. Pretty easy to use and understand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mello

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheaply made, I bought them for stocking stuffers and they broke before I could even put them in the stocking
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons ages 4 and 6 love them. A few extraneous buttons to be ignored at their age... they work well in our large yard... an overall good buy
customer_reviews.author: dar

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sound was very good. Kids had no trouble setting up, range was great. Color was bright.
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Tintec walkie talkies
customer_reviews.text: They are x mas gift so haven't let the grand kids have them yet --But they look good and just what the kids wanted --I feel they will love them because they are always using mine
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Great product for kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our grandchildren, actually bought two sets. Works great for our needs, 28 acre farm. Really liked the three different colors! However, one set came with two blue and one pink, instead of the yellow. Kind of put a kink in the mix, but we will make it work. So much easier when everyone has their own color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these for her birthday and boy am I happy we purchased these!! It keeps us from yelling across the house!! Only regret should have purchased a set of 4 not three bc my husband and I have to share one...
customer_reviews.author: A. R.

customer_reviews.title: Walkie Talkies to 7 year olds
customer_reviews.text: So far the kids love these and they are working properly. If anything changes, I'll post it, but thus far everyone is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jalIseo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. 1 of the 3 broke within 2 weeks. A metal tab in the back broke & now the battery won’t make a connection. The other two power on and off randomly & the sound quality is average at best. Save your money & buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: SLW2019

customer_reviews.title: Very nice your children will love them
customer_reviews.text: I received these today my children love them 11 boy 9 girl and 6 boy...we haven't been outside yet to test the distance I will be updating soon
customer_reviews.author: Annetrice Crockett

customer_reviews.title: The girls are having fun with them.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to pass old traditional toys as a new but fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Candygirl

customer_reviews.title: Bought them twice
customer_reviews.text: Loved them that much. We have 5, now that one is broken but we all use it in the house. It works about 50-75 feet because we live in the city. But its not bad. My 3yo loves it and knows how to use the other settings. So it gives ease.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Richards

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. The insides where the batteries go where missing the metal prongs/ positive and negative connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my daughter just can’t stop playing with them, I wish they had longer range, so could be able to contact her favorite cousing that lives 3 milles away 😅!
customer_reviews.author: Anali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: These worked well all summer for all three of my kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: RachelB

product_meta.title: Tintec 3 Pack Walkie Talkies, 22 Channels 2 way Radio Toy with Backlit LCD Flashlight, 3 Miles Range for Kids, Outdoor Adventures, Camping, Hiking
product_meta.description:
Product specifications:
Pack：3 
Color: Pink & Yellow & Blue
Channels: 22 
Sub-code: CTCSS 99 tones 
Frequency: 400-470MHz 
Range: Up to 2 miles (Open field)
Battery: each one need 4 x 1.5V AAA alkaline environment-friendly batteries. (not included)
Transmission Power： 0.5W Modulation 
Type: FM-F3E Walkie talkies for kid set includes 3 walkie talkie units: There are communication devices which operate on mobile radio frequencies. They come with 8/20/22(option)channels as well as a backlit LCD screen, enabling you to communication over several kilometers free of charge (up to 3km in open areas) for future consultation.

Package Included:
·3-pack walkie talkies
·User Manual

Why Choose Tintec?
All Our Products are produced under Strict Quality Inspection.
Life-time Technical Support
Professional After-Sales Team.
feature_bullets: ✅[Hands-Free Feature]: Tintec walkie talkie support voice activation(VOX) talking---relax kids hands, send your voice without pressing the TALK button. It is helpful in outside adventures, hiking, camping, riding and other different activities. Best memory gift for family.

✅[Useful Functions]: 22 Main Channels 462-467mhz (FRS/GMRS) with Sub-channels, ensuring 2 miles wireless communication. When using the CTCSS (Continuous Tone Coded Squelch System), you are free to use 99 low frequency tones (67-250mhz), your signals will not be disturbed with this strong anti-interference performance.

✅[Friendly Design]: Portable and easy to use, 1.2m drop resistant, built-in flashlight for playing at night, day and night companionship. with cool exterior, compact bodies, ergonomic design, channel lock function and simple push-to-talk operation, intended for kids aged 3 and up.,
✅[Easy to Use]: Modern compact design. Simple push to talk operation, double click to activate a beep single. Broadcast to one or multiple units, ability to use different channels.

✅[Perfect Gift for Children]: Kids LOVE to chat by these well-made walkie talkies, it’s a perfect choice to present your child directly. Great for both indoor and outdoor activities such as going shopping, spring outing and summer camping.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars562 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
